评论详情: This bracelet strikes a balance between trendy and elegant, with its chunky design and sleek finish. The hinged cuff makes it easy to wear, and the craftsmanship is impressive for the price. Perfect for adding a touch of glamour to any outfit!

This is a nice set of 2 bracelets by Elegance 11. They are exactly as described and appear solid and shiny. I like the wave design. They are sturdy, not flimsy at all. One bracelet is larger than the other, and they look great worn together or separately. I have small wrists, and these are just right, not too big or small. I look forward to showing off these pretty bracelets adorning my wrist! Thank you!

My daughter and I both love wearing bracelets and when I saw these, I just thought they were very cute with their chunky look. I ordered the set of two so that they could complement each other although I might give one to her and we can wear them individually However you can see they go well together and they fit together nicely. I love that they are easy to put on and off. They also have a very nice way to them so they feel like good quality costume jewelry

The bracelets are extremely shiny and are sort of heavy. The clasp is secured by magnets and is springy.  The bracelets was a bit on the bigger side, even for my average wrist (2.75" diameter). So it may not be suitable for smaller wrists.  How I rate the products I review. 1 Star - Does not work / would cause damage in any use case 2 Stars - Works but poor quality / poorly made 3 Stars - Would work fine in other situations, just not mine / lacking more than one thing or has many annoying traits / this product is a decide-for-yourself type of product 4 Stars - Works as described but lacks one small thing or has one small annoying trait / still a decent buy 5 Stars - A perfect Item with a perfect price-to-quality ratio/ you should definitely buy! (I would also give a product that would normally get 4 Stars this if I can justify why)
I literally only gave 4 stars because they tend to pinch my skin around my wrist. Outside of that, I loveee them! i get compliments on them and they are so oddly shaped. Loveee
I am wearing these bangles on the sleeve, like on the fabric on the wrist, and it looks very cool. They feel comfortable.

These bangles fit my thin wrists (6 1/2" circumference" well without sagging over my hand. The hinge seems secure and the metal has a nice shine that doesn't look cheap. They look good as a single bracelet or as a pair. Getting both pieces for the price is a good deal imo!
Very nice. Fits well. Does not pinch my wrist. Great design and great weight.

These bangles look amazing and make outfits more elegant! I appreciate how easy it is to put on and off with the hinges, and they are great quality. I only wear one bangle since they are large, but they could also be worn stacked or one on each hand.

So I bought this for my wife who loved the design of this simple bracelet. As the description states, it is irregular shaped, it's chunky, it's twisted and it's thick. It's also pretty heavy and solid. Yeah it's silver in color but even to my untrained eye you're not going to mistake this for real silver. I also wouldn't call it exactly glossy or shiny. But the wife doesn't care. She's happy with it so I'm happy with it!
I love these bracelets they are nice and compliments any other accessories
